blog.name: tyrus-still-lives
blog.title: We STAN Tyrus 🏳️‍🌈
blog.description: Asks and Fic requests are always open 💝 Tyrus/Ambi/Muffy/Jibby ❤️Josh is messy, but we still love him.

tags: ive never had a fan before
summary: oof this is my main not my am side blog so let’s ignore that sksksk but i just wanted to let you know i absolutely ADORE your...
question: oof this is my main not my am side blog so let’s ignore that sksksk but i just wanted to let you know i absolutely ADORE your fic; ‘fluff and holiday cheer’ (i think that’s what it’s called idk it’s nearly 11pm for me so i’m not very coherent) ,,, it’s honestly amazing and makes me so beyond happy !!!! you’re so talented and wonderful and just thank you for that blessing of a fic it’s honestly one of my favourites !!! and yeah i just hope you’re having a fab day !!! 💝💘💗
answer:
Aww thank you so much this is so pure!! (This is like one of my first fan messages so I’m honored) I will hopefully have one more chapter within a week (I meant to get it out so long ago but my life has been crazy), but thanks for your kind words! This fandom got me back into writing. I used to write all the time but my English teacher last year kind of killed my soul. I’m so happy to be writing again and I hope to produce many future works (I have a bunch of prompts in my asks that I have yet to get to because college is hard)

This honestly made my day though!! 💝💘💗

blog.name: tyrus-still-lives
blog.title: We STAN Tyrus 🏳️‍🌈
blog.description: Asks and Fic requests are always open 💝 Tyrus/Ambi/Muffy/Jibby ❤️Josh is messy, but we still love him.

summary: Unpopular opinion: i think Luke just has really soulful eyes and so when TJ looks at Cyrus it's platonic even though he looks at...
question: Unpopular opinion: i think Luke just has really soulful eyes and so when TJ looks at Cyrus it's platonic even though he looks at him like one would look at the moon.   Either that or Luke wants Tyrus, so he gives him those deep looks and smirks without the director realizing his intentions. Director thinks he's just doing casual TJ, but Luke is actually doing crushing TJ.   Here's hoping i'm wrong!
answer:
Haha strongly disagree. I think Luke has been playing up the crushing T.J. because he’s been told that’s where his character is going. The show-creator, Terri Minsky, has heavily hinted at Tyrus, and she clearly favors T.J.’s character over the other recurring characters (he is by far the most developed out of the recurring characters and she has written many of T.J. and Cyrus’s important scenes herself). She also really pushes for Cyrus’s storylines in general (I believe she also personally wrote both of Cyrus’s coming out scenes, as well). She is pushing Disney to let her add as much of their storyline as the network will allow!

Luke does have pretty soulful eyes though.


Send me your unpopular opinions!

blog.name: tyrus-still-lives
blog.title: We STAN Tyrus 🏳️‍🌈
blog.description: Asks and Fic requests are always open 💝 Tyrus/Ambi/Muffy/Jibby ❤️Josh is messy, but we still love him.

summary: what do you mean by they'll get lots of backlash  if they dont do tyrus? Is it a fandom-wide ship or are there just a lot of...
question: what do you mean by they'll get lots of backlash  if they dont do tyrus? Is it a fandom-wide ship or are there just a lot of tyrus tumblrs?   Is the majority fanbase demanding tyrus? Are the intended audience (kids) demanding tyrus???   I feel like i've missed some memo about tyrus in future eps...
answer:
This show has gained a lot of attention for Cyrus being one of the first openly gay characters on Disney Channel and (assuming the other main characters have endgame relationships) Disney would earn backlash for not treating Cyrus’s storyline the same or at least similar. Also, Tyrus has been hinted at so heavily in the show (I mean swing scene 2.0 seemed like it was taken straight out of a stereotypical rom-com minus an angry kiss. There were deliberate decisions made in the way it was shot and edited and the music playing at the end that hint towards romantic feelings). There is so much romantic coding in their relationship with parallels to the het couples on the show (and T.J.’s seeming need to touch Cyrus in ALMOST. EVERY. SCENE.), that not going through with it at this point would pretty much be queer baiting. Also, T.J. looked back and Josh literally said they didn’t expect them to cut back to Buffy first so they didn’t expect a debate (pretty much confirming that Tuffy isn’t a thing)

There is a way to make platonic and affectionate male friendships, and this is not it. Many middle schoolers can understand that (not to mention the many high schoolers and adults that watch specifically because of Cyrus’s storyline). Thus, not going through with the storyline would seem like Disney is oversensoring and let down the many viewers that are watching specifically to see themselves reflected on screen.

Also, there’s not really much reason for Luke to have been on set so much if he wasn’t for Cyrus (Garren was there quite a bit so we can assume that Muffy is a thing, and it’s pretty clear that Jandi will probably be endgame. That leaves T.J. for Cyrus). Luke was actually one of the last the recurring actors to leave set during the shooting of the s3 finale so he clearly has a significant part in that.

Sorry this is rambly, but I think it would be really crappy at this point for Disney to refuse a relationship for Cyrus and T.J. is the most obvious option because they’ve already heavily hinted at it.

Thanks for the ask!
